detail_desc: Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey in a narrow cut at the top.
Oversized jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders and wide, extra-long, sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
T-shirts in soft,organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, buttons down the front, a double-layered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave. Relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front and rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a brushed finish. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and long sleeves with overlocked edges. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
3/4-length leggings in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with a high waist and concealed zip and button at one side. Unlined.
Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and a collar with decorative press-studs. Zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Short A-line skirt.
Fitted, ribbed polo-neck top in an asymmetric cut at the front. Long sleeves with shoulder pads and sewn-in turn-ups.
Short, sleeveless lace dress in a narrow cut at the top with a cut-out section at the back, a covered button at the back of the neck and short, narrow shoulder straps. Partly lined.
Metal hair clips with glittery decorations. Size 4 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Baby Exclusive. Bootees knitted in a wool and recycled polyester blend with a drawstring at the top. Soft, organic cotton jersey lining.
Short skirt in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon with an elasticated waist that has a small frill trim at the top. Lined.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a text print, unlined hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in airy linen jersey. Deep V-neck at the back with a knot detail.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a slightly wider, ribbed neckline, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, airy modal jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with an elasticated waist.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Fitted top in ribbed cotton with a neckline and shoulder tabs in contrasting colour canvas, metal press-studs on the shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back. Double layer at the top.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a button at the top, chest pocket with a button and press-studs at the crotch.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.

Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a round neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Blouse in a softly draping weave with a round neck and small opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, long batwing sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop with a rubber print at the back. Mesh insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Cardigan in textured-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in stretch, ribbed, organic cotton jersey.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a deep neckline and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirt bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a dungaree dress, short-sleeved top, pair of leggings and a hairband. Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with patch front pockets, straps with a decorative knot detail at the front, and press-studs at the back. Jersey top with butterfly sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist. Double-layered jersey hairband with a knot detail at the front.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow on the front.
Flip-flops with plastic straps and fabric appliqués (sizes 7-9 with a strap around the heel) and fluted rubber soles.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Maxi dress in an airy crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight, cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif at the top and an unlined hood with a small wrapover at the front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Cropped, boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and several rows of rainbow-coloured flounces at the front.
Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit motif on the front, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line dress in pleated jersey with a round neckline, small opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one crêped. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a flounce-trimmed yoke.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front and a chin guard at the top. Flap chest pocket with press-studs and front pockets with a taped zip. Adjustable elastication at the back of the waist and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the legs and back, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Folded seams and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric. Unlined.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Dungaree dress in a stretch weave with adjustable straps with press-studs and a chest pocket. Seam at the waist with fake pockets and press-studs at the sides, fake fly and a back pocket. Unlined.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Jacket in grained imitation leather with a collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lining in a contrasting colour.
Trainers with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with a round, roll-edge neckline, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed side pockets and fake back pockets.
Fully lined bikini top with padded cups, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back.
Short, fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, shoulder pads, long sleeves with a decorative button at the cuffs and decorative covered buttons at the hem.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
